env.name: CI_JOB_TOKEN
env.description: The GitLab job token to use for authentication. Preferred over personal access tokens.

env.name: GITLAB_TOKEN
env.description: The GitLab token to use for creating the release when using a personal access token.

env.name: GITLAB_BOT_TOKEN
env.description: The GitLab token to use for creating the release when using a project bot account.
